Title: Agropastoralists? Late Iron Age and historic forest livelihoods in the Cherangani Hills of north-west Kenya
Abstract: © Antiquity Publications Ltd, 2020.Drawing upon new evidence emerging from Kenya's Cherangani Hills, this research project furthers current understanding of the archaeology of Late Iron Age forest-dwelling communities in East Africa, focusing on a series of intriguing earthworks deep inside forest environments that are reminiscent of the 'Sirikwa' tradition.
